auth.title: Reset password
auth.descriptionForConfirmMail: A confirmation link has been sent to the $mail. Click on it and confirm your account
auth.descriptionForResetPassword: A recovery link has been sent to your $mail. Click on it and come up with a new password
auth.passwordResetSuccessful: The password has been successfully reset
auth.passwordResetDescription: Use the new password for subsequent authorizations in the application
auth.goLoginScreenButtonLabel: Go back to the login page
